actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families

official_title: To honor the ExploraVision Awards Program and to encourage more students to participate in this innovative national student science competition.

summary.text: Honors the ExploraVision Awards Program as an innovative national student science competition for its outstanding contribution to science education. Encourages students in kindergarten through grade 12 across the country to participate in this innovative student science competition. Commends the Toshiba Corporation and the National Science Teachers Association for their dedication to such Program. Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation calling upon the people of the United States to support the goals of such Program.

titles.title: To honor the ExploraVision Awards Program and to encourage more students to participate in this innovative national student science competition.
